ul.li: XSLT 3.0 against XML or JSON input or no input starting with xsl:template name="xsl:initial-template", all with support for creating and displaying various xsl:result-documents
XQuery 3.1 against XML or JSON input or no input
XPath 3.1 against XML or JSON input or no input
CoffeeSacks, a Saxon extension library to support Invisible XML, has been integrated for XSLT, XQuery and XPath
